website_summaries.verdict: This impressive slipcover is barely noticeable on most couches with its strapless design.
pros: Customers laud the slipcover's attractive design
Cover molds to the furniture for a smooth, non-wrinkled look
cons: Can be difficult to place on some couches

customer_reviews.title: Worth the gamble!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews & reread hoping the positive reviews are honest & legitimate on about every item I purchase. I can safely state this slip cover looks fabulous, feels fabulous & is not a thin cheap material. I have a very dark brown oversized loveseat. I purchased the Silver. It is actually a off white which was exactly what I was hoping for! I love gray but did not want a gray loveseat. It goes on easily no straps or ties, just slide it over match up the lines and tuck! I wanted easy on & off due to having a misbehaving 10 month old Rottweiler that loves to jump on furniture . I definitely ordered the right cover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, almost like custom made.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our new living room set based on the customers reviews and we made the right choice, the material looks good, soft and good quality, it has elastic all the way to on the bottom that wraps around the sofa legs. Of course after sitting and watching a couple of movies they need to be re-arranged a little but that's normal, a lot better than the blankets we had on our old set. Will buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Not your grandma’s slipcover!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was really surprised at how easy it was to put this slipcover on my loveseat. The combination of velour and spandex made for a good fit and it stays in place, transforming my outdated print loveseat so that it looks good and is comfortable as well. We got a light color so I was very impressed with how easy it was to spot clean. 9/26-We decided to order a second slipcover in the Zinfandel red. A great color for the room and probably a better choice for a loveseat that gets a lot of pet use. Also, threw the silver cloud slipcover in the washer and it came out great! Wish I’d found these slipcovers sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Days

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!
customer_reviews.text: Way too small it just keeps sliding up. Very sad cause the material is nice but just doesn't fit I bought the love seat and sofa one and neither fit
customer_reviews.author: Mv

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Very soft, fit perfect, and look nice! Very pleased!!! Definitely worth the money, high quality!!
customer_reviews.author: JennH

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this, but before I could even get it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but before I could even get it on the couch, I found a one inch hole at one of the seams. It went back immediately, and I'll look for a better product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a beige colored couch cover. However, when the package came in the mail, the color was closer to a pink than a beige and it looked very tacky. In addition, the cover did not fit my couch properly. When I went to return the product, I was told that it was too late to return so now I am stuck with a product that I can't use. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel stover

customer_reviews.title: The perfect, affordable solution for changing your furniture
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these covers. I have a huge patterned sectional that I loath the pattern, but it fits so nicely in our space and is structurally sound. I wanted it covered with out spending a fortune. These were the perfect solution allowing me to redecorate without spending a fortune. I used two love seat covers and one sofa. Hook and loop tape and upholstery screws easily hid the spot for the inside arms. It is velvety and has a bit of a shine, but it will be perfect once I add some throws And pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyj34

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, fits great, soft and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these slip covers! They do not come with anchors, be aware, but they keep in place pretty well without them! I’m going to buy some anchors to help them stay perfectly tucked all the time though. That being said, again, these are fantastic slipcovers! The material is high quality and so cozy and soft! I bought the Dove Grey color. I didn’t realize they have a marking on the inside to indicate the back and front, so do yourself a favor and look for that and save yourself a bunch of time and wrestling with the slipcover while putting it on. Hahah! A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Beehner

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: I give this couch cover one star because it completely ruined my couch underneath. As you can see I have a blue fabric couch and within a month it has completely left pills all over my couch and the dark blue is staining the light blue underneath. You can see the color variation on the back of the cushion as compared to the front where people normally sit. It has been completely dry during the entire use and the fabric dye is just cheap and gets all over everything. I’m going to have to pay a lot of money to get my couch professionally cleaned now. I am extremely angry. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: Briana M

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and very soft fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new slipcovers; I have them on a sofa and loveseat and they fit very well and stay in place without pins. My only disappointment is that the color I ordered (black) isn't as black as my other furniture. Otherwise, they are great; I was able to put them on without help, and they wash up well. They do collect dog hair just like the fabric of the sofa and loveseat did, but it comes off easily with a lint roller. Spot-cleaning with a damp cloth has been sufficient for everything but dog odor; after washing, there was no odor whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect for my living room! I was almost about to buy new couches but I'm so glad I decided to try these first instead. Saved me so much money!! They are very soft and were easy to put on. Before I purchased, I read some reviews of people complaining about how it doesn't stay tucked very well. I personally don't even care. All I wanted was to cover or replace my old brown couches I had before and for the price, these covers are the perfect solution!! Obviously measure your couches or chairs before you purchase to make sure they fit.. if you don't, you can't really put the blame on the product for not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different cover, this one will just fall apart on you
customer_reviews.text: This has a weird fit, specifically around the arms in both the front and back. It takes a lot of finagling to get it to work right, but it will always look a little awkward. The big problem here is that it is not at all durable. I have had this for a few months and the seems have ripped in 6 different locations leaving large holes. This is on a couch that doesn't even get sat on that much! Choose a different cover, this one will just fall apart on you
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Couch Cover
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a dog and needed some covers for my white couches in the front room. Although this cover appears to be cut for lower arm rests, it fits just fine over my high arm loveseat. (I also bought the larger size cover for my sofa, as well.) I like this cover because my couch still looks nice. I should've purchased sooner as it's more convenient to just cover up the couches and later throw the covers in the wash as opposed to having to vacuum. My only concern is I wish the seller also made a cover for my chaise. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but still a great budget upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit perfectly, but it's still 5x better than the ugly old upholstery! (See the ottoman at the right of the picture for reference--GROSS!). The material is extremely soft and stretchy. It appears it would better fit a larger love seat than mine, but I'll keep playing around with it to see if there's a better way to tuck it in. It stays in place pretty well; just needs a little tuck under the seat cushion when I get up. I don't mind, because even a regular couch will need pillows and throws adjusted upon standing. Now if only they'd make an ottoman cover to match!!
customer_reviews.author: Levi & Amber Burlison

customer_reviews.title: Average, maddening to put on furniture...
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy w/ the "look" of this fabric -- it felt cheap to me. I also couldn't fit it on my loveseat in a way where it stayed put, so back it went. It was maddening trying to get it arranged. Had it fit my loveseat, I would have considered keeping it, the fabric isn't terrible, to be clear. But you do get what you pay for. To its credit, the elastic seemed pretty well sewn.... If it fits the furniture,its price point is appealing to dress up something dumpster-bound.....
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it - Important to Know - Buy tuck grips and bed sheet fasteners to make them stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use to market/show my home because I didn't want to buy new furniture until I moved. They look and feel really nice, but you have to buy the tuck grips and bed sheet fasteners to make them stay in place. All in all it was worth the money. It's a nice inexpensive option to buying a new sofa and love seat.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Palos

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: The tag on the cover showing where to place on loveseat was incorrectly placed, so I had to play with it for a while to figure out the best way to put it on the couch. It doesn't fit incredibly well, but it's ok enough for a loveseat in my office at work. Once on, everyone in the office gushes about how cute my couch looks now. I got the grey geometric pattern and it is very chic-looking.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving reviews but I’m just totally loving them!! Need to go to store to get like pool noodles yet. Heard they work really well to keep things tucked. I have two cats and just have to use my hand to gather fur. Besides I have to tuck the one I sit on every once in a while (and other reviewers say just need something to tuck between the cushions and back - gotta try that yet) they are so soft and really pretty! I personally don’t think you can go wrong and really did look at a lot and kept coming back to this one. Glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for my couch to make it match the color of my other couch. I have dogs and cats and thanks to the cover it keeps my couch so much cleaner. The cats stop scratching the arms since the micro fiber doesn't feel as nice on thier claws so that's a huge plus. Also it doesn't really attact hair as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jane and Ailyn

customer_reviews.title: deep color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a little loveseat that I got on facebook marketplace. The color of this is nice and deep and the material is like a velet type. Make sure when you order you pay attention to the measurements. One thing i like about this is it stays put. Other stretch covers we have had slide around or pop off. This one doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I have three of them for my three couches and they are great. Our dogs are on them all the time and they still look great. Easy to wash, won't shrink if you wash on a low heat setting. Very soft and easy to get dog hair of off. Doesn't stain easily (at least not the gray color that I have). Would definitely suggest these covers if you have animals or children because it's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Picture says it all.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Recommend putting cushions on top to keep slipcover in place. If you need to cover cushions as well, get separate cushion covers. I didn’t need to cover mine, though. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Bummed it didn’t fit my 54” leather loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover a leather loveseat that was starting to shed hoping to get a little more life out of it. My loveseat is 54 wide so figured it would fit but no such luck. As I tucked one area in, it would just pull out somewhere else. Nicely made and decent thickness (key consideration with dog nails). Bummed I have to find a plan B.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Alba

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but wish they were a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: These slipcovers are so soft and pretty, and they make my furniture so much more comfortable. Unfortunately, my furniture must be a little taller than the covers are designed for because they are a few inches too short for both my couch and loveseat. They would also stay in place better if I could tuck more fabric. Even so, I’m keeping them because they make my coarse, cat-scratched furniture so soft.
customer_reviews.author: CindiJeanie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I have oversized loveseats soooo they fit but not perfectly. For one loveseat I had to put the back cushions on top to keep the cover in place. It did not fit over all the cushions (loveseat was within size recommendations). For the other loveseat it fit better but you have to tuck it in over and over. Overall they are good quality. Super soft and for the price they are doing the job! ***Third pic is of couch that fit a little bit better. Has attached cushions. I forgot to take a before pic).***
customer_reviews.author: Buhbyegirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for a cover!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sofa cover! It covers almost the entire couch from front to back. It is also very soft and the silver cloud color is beautiful (like a mix between light silver and ivory). I just don't know how well it will stay in place since it's just tucked in where the cushions meet.
customer_reviews.author: AnonyUser

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my home office
customer_reviews.text: I saw this slipcover in a store but not in the size I needed to cover a loveseat that clashed with everything in the room. Now it is looks nice and created the look I wanted for a more professional yet cozy space. Easy to install. Well worth the price to make the room look the way I wanted without redoing the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good fit! Soft and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these couch covers. They fit perfectly over my 3 seat couch and love seat. The material is soft, like a blanket. Changes color when you run your hand over it, like velvet. It’s very stretchy and it was easy to put over the couches. Not sure how it is when it gets dirty yet but we’ll see. Feels fairly well made, but I feel like my dogs could possibly rip it with their claws, again this has not happened but we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Goncharuk

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this cover
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cover. I got the wild dove gray color and it looks like the picture. It's overall good quality, comfortable and durable against my cats. It was really easy to put on and fits well. My couch is 59" in width and I was able to tuck in the excess fabric and stretch it to fit pretty much perfectly. Guests have commented saying they love "my new couch." Those who know it was a hand me down couch and remember it from before say they could never tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the brown to go with my burgundy chairs and love seat pillows. The material is great and it went on so easy. Everyone who sees it loves the soft feel of it. Because my love seat is slightly curved and my 5 dogs are on it constantly I had to get grips for it to help hold it in place. By the way two of my dogs shed terribly and this cover does not hold the pet hair which makes it easy to clean. I would recommend this to everyone wanting a love seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sharli

customer_reviews.title: Before and after
customer_reviews.text: This cover transformed my living room! It is so soft and nice to look at. Puts a nice fung shui in the room. The only downside is when you sit down it does come out of the creases a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine andre

customer_reviews.title: super soft
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the wine colored in a loveseat size. Fits perfectly and is super soft. Will order additional for the other sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Mekie Moo

customer_reviews.title: Soft..nice color..but not durable with dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and softness of this loveseat cover. Unfortunately with dogs the fabric isn't strong or durable enough. It was only on a day before it ripped. I wish someone made a cover with denim or a stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: g.l.

customer_reviews.title: I would like the produt I bought be little bit large just it. I enjoy and I hope to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: I like the sofa’s color that you put on the site, but when I bought it came very clear. I would really like to buy again, but I think the correct color would be "Send" and I think you don't have to sell. Look at the color of your couch and look at the color that came, very light. But the product is good, soft good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dayse

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant colors and water and mud proof
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and color wipes right off with spills. I was hoping that it would hold up to my dogs claws. Leaves a little tear in it. But I have 120 lbs dog. But even so it didn't snag or pull out threads so still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Doggy mommy

customer_reviews.title: It fits "almost" perfect.  Soft!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my loveseat it fit my loveseat very well. I made sure to get a Brown one because my loveseat is brown. It is doing a great job for me because my love seat is brown and it fits very well even though it shows a little bit of the couch. I wouldn't suggest to buy one that is a totally different color than your couch.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the loveseat cover. It's the first I have purchased over the years that doesn't look like I am trying to hide an ugly loveseat when all I want to do is switch the color. The color is rich, the texture is very soft and it is well made. I will buy this again when I am ready to switch colors again.
customer_reviews.author: LAnorthshore

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on covers
customer_reviews.text: Love this slip on sofa cover, very easy to put on, easy to clean n material is very durable. Great product, will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart was incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: So I REALLY loved this cover but the 3 star rating was because it didn't fit my couch, although measurements suggested it would. It had a really nice, heavy feel to it, beautiful color, and was stretchy. BUT, where it got me was that I could get it to fit on my couch I just wasn't able to tuck it in without it popping up and showing the bottom of the couch. It basically looked like a tent on my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy Freese

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color .
customer_reviews.text: It's a couch cover so I didnt have huge expectations. Overall I am pleased with how it looks . I love the color, and I'll have to kind of play with the covers more until I get them just right . It looks a lot better than the chipped feaux leather ! Only thing I need now is some new throw pillows !( the ones shown are from my bed , so I could sort of spruce it up lol ) maybe I'll get another set in black for a change every now and then .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover, so soft and comfortable! It doesn't attract too much dog hair and can be easily lint rolled to remove hair that does stick. No regrets and would purchase again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: Not Completely Sold
customer_reviews.text: I'm still not sure about this product. After having it about a week, it's starting to stretch out, which isn't bad just yet. I am concerned how it'll look a few months from now though. I will say it's SOOOOO soft. I think if it weren't so soft, I would have returned it already, but softness is just so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Saved me $400.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! Transformed my old chair. It’s a bit big for the chair, but I decided to keep it cuz it looks fine after I tucked it better. Durable and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived so I do not know how durable it will be. I washed but let it hang dry. The sides are just shy of fitting. It has straps and when I figure then out I am sure they will take care of that. Not to bad. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas McGuire

customer_reviews.title: More fleece than velvet. A nice cover though.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not velvet. This is a fleece material. Mine fits better than the previous cover I had (which was saggy) but is a bit short in the back. I fixed it with some staples and upholstery screws though and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 3 mastiffs...UPDATE 4 months later!!!
customer_reviews.text: And NO rips or tears. Wonderful! This is an update.4 months later, 3 mastiffs and one pit and STILL no tears. Throw them in the washer and good as new! My dogs spend all day on these. Absolutely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was more of a red but that’s just my preference. It’s more of a maroon. It fits ok. I forgot to take a pic of the loveseat before but hopefully the couch before will be suffice. Mine have cushions on the back that aren’t attached so that made it kind of difficult but other than that it fit ok. I haven’t sat on it yet to review the stay but my thinking is bc of the back cushions it might move around. I couldn’t tuck the back in very well. I noticed the pics look like wrinkles & sagging but it is not. It’s the fabric & lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Moodyfrog

customer_reviews.title: Color transfers onto upholstery
customer_reviews.text: The dark blue color transferred onto my ivory upholstery. Unfortunately I didn't notice it until a couple of months later. Sad because I put the covers on in an effort to not have stains.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bay Home Modern Velvet Plush Strapless Slipcover
customer_reviews.text: The sofa and loveseat velvet slipcovers are very soft and stylish. They're the perfect neutral color for any accent pillow. I'm interested in a right side chaise slipcover made of the same material. Is this available? I'm very happy with my purchase. I will recommend the slipcovers to my family and friends..
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay in place however it is sturdy and is soft
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it doesn't stay in place with leather couches also I didn't realize it was Fluffy I saw it was just a cut tintype stretch material
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this slipcover for a loveseat in my living room that is seldom used. Since my kitties liked to scratch it, the material was starting to look really bad. I picked this one because of the color, but mostly because all the others were shown on couches without exposed legs. Since my loveseat has exposed legs, this one was the one I wanted. I am so glad I picked it- it fits perfectly and now my kitties no longer scratch- they sleep on it because the velvet material is so comfy! Absolutely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pluta

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, easy to use, & affordable!
customer_reviews.text: The package literally just came to my door and I’m already sitting on the couch with the cover on! Super easy to set up, super soft, and the color is exactly what I wanted! I went to bed bath & beyond prior looking for a couch cover and ended up spending over $250 for two. Needless to say I returned it the next day and could have spent the money I used on a whole new couch... I hopped on amazon and found this product within the first few minutes of searching, ordered it and it was delievered within 24 hours!! Absolutely in love with the product! Going to look for matching pillows after writing this review :)
customer_reviews.author: celina carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful on my couch
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on my couch and fits like a glove. Very stretchy so any excess fabric can be easily tucked into your couch so it doesn’t look messy
customer_reviews.author: Stephen/Kaitlyn Dzienis

customer_reviews.title: Poorly make Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover was very cheaply made and looked terrible made on love seat. I would have sent it back but through away the package it came in!
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated person

customer_reviews.title: Best couch covers
customer_reviews.text: These cover are amazing! I have kids and cats and they hold up to both. I got them to cover my kid roughed up couches and they seriously are the best ones I have purchased! Some covers are thin and you can hear tearing when you tuck into the corners. Not these! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: heidi schlipf

customer_reviews.title: Money WELL SPENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These couch and love seat covers are the bees knees ok?...there SUPER easy to put on and they look marvelous on my living room couches. I never thought that I could find couch covers that fit so perfectly without having them specially ordered to size these ones are perfect. Such a great purchase and I'm glad I did purchased them after being skeptical from the last ones I purchased that didn't fit or stay in place. Money WELL SPENT!!😊
customer_reviews.author: nee nean

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I purchased these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I’ve ever wrote! I have 2 huskies and furniture less than 2 years old that looked horrible! Between water spots and the material was like Velcro to dog fur, it looked 10 years old! I had been contemplating ordering these for months and I’m so happy I did! The fit is great, and it is so soft! Not to mention the dog hair vacuums off!!! On the original couch material I’d have to BRUSH my couches, then vacuum! Needless to say, I’m pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: danielle froment

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, fits my loveseat well. The material is more a fleece texture. It works well on my furniture since it has no skirt. I bought it to protect from my dogs and I have not yet laundered it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just received these so I cannot attest to the durability or washability yet. These are exactly what I was looking for, they are very very soft and they feel like they will hold up. At first I purchased the dove Gray which I really didn't like and I returned them and I got dark gray which I am very very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4, they were easy to install, one gets used a lot, I just popped it into the machine and back on, it still looks like the others that haven't been washed yet and its been a few months since my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Snowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Not great for oversized loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Not great for oversized loveseat. Our love seat may just have odd dimensions, but this cover does not completely cover it. About 2" of the couch is exposed at the bottom. And we had to buy throw pillows to keep it from coming loose in the inner corners.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS. SUPER SOFT and stretchy. No pilling, no shows cat hair
customer_reviews.text: This are super fabulous! As everybody else said, they are super soft. I would like to point out that l have cats and the hair doesn't show at all, which l was really and happily surprised (at least on the color l choose). I bought "silver cloud" color and it's super beautiful and elegant. A neutral that goes with everything and never get tired of it. I waited to write a review because l wanted to see if the material pills. No pill or fuzz so far. Also it's very easy to put then on. Make sure you measure your couch!
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as nice as the picture. Babysitting some kittens that aren't declawed and this has protected my couch real well. Its a great cover that works well and looks great. Doesn't bunch.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne malarae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these covers for a long time. I wasnt sure what was going to be perfect for our home - but now I do. Thanks. Their perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for our couch and it's really great to protect our couch from our cats. This is the only material that they cannot destroy and it looks beautiful. We got it in maroon and it looks so royal, plus the fabric is so soft. It's also really easy to clean and put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Aydela S.

customer_reviews.title: Really useful.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to defend our living room couch and love-seat from our 2 year old Granddaughter. They are easy to put on, easy to clean and they really work.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: we liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Once we found the directions, cleverly located on a fabric tag on one corder of the slipcover, we liked it a lot! It woud be good if the card that come with the material told us how to find it. Neverteless it is working well for us on a 52 inch sofa, keeping our dog off the lemon yellow leather and he likes it too. Thank you, Michele M
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I put this over a loveseat that was torn by a puppy. It didn't last very long - in less then a couple months it started tearing apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice velvet loveseat cover
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect to be a great fabric and good quality I really love this product and it’s look nice, isn’t fit perfect to my leather loveseat sofa but at least cover all the sofa it’s just a little bit big, otherwise looks great
customer_reviews.author: Lady M Hamed

customer_reviews.title: Another few years from my cheap-o furniture!
customer_reviews.text: My bonded leather furniture has started flaking, this slip cover has added years before I need to purchase new stuff. It fits well, was easy to install, looks good and stays in place. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fleecey cover is nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft fleece and fits well on my large chair. Its a chair that pulls out into a twin bed. I ordered the loveseat size and it fits pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Werner

customer_reviews.title: Cover for our "dog sofa"
customer_reviews.text: ...the sofa that our dog took over that is. Perfect b/c washable and dog hair doesn't show. Good fit. Pretty for the "dog sofa" in our bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, no complaints at all. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: Good material. Looks nice. Got hole in seam after a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and soft. Easy to “install.” Great value for the price. I recommend getting the spiral upholstery pins to really make the fit look neat.
customer_reviews.author: Cedar Abadie

customer_reviews.title: Do not really understand why this has such good reviews. I am only giving this two stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not really understand why this has such good reviews. I am only giving this two stars because it was so soft and the fabric was nice. But I there is nothing to hold the couch down. It fits my couch fine but it poofs out. It does not come out like the picture at all. My couch cushions are sown in, so I do not really know what I am supposed to do. I am really annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Rorancatham

customer_reviews.title: Fit okay, but unattractive
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover fit our loveseat fine, however, it made our living room look shabby. We were covering a nice leather loveseat that started to show wear, so the look was totally different.
customer_reviews.author: xibits

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a loveseat that had extremely soiled arms. It now looks like new! I don’t know how it will hold up to washing, but for now, I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ritasan

customer_reviews.title: Soft material.
customer_reviews.text: Soft material. A bit small for my large loveseat leaving the some of the bottom exposed but still works for me. Kept it anyway since it fits everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Ya1122

customer_reviews.title: Not the hideous couch cover you're imagining!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought an ugly couch that looked even uglier after I repainted, this covered it beautifully! I though all couch covers were hideous but this one looks beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time ordering this color cover. I was send the wrong item the first time, and reordered again, and they got it right. I’m very happy with the product. It’s exactly how it was Describe on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to clean, but bit tricky
customer_reviews.text: Amazing velvety cover, we finally uSr our sofa again. Cleans great. Only down side... almost impossible to tell front from back when putting on, I end up tryig it four times at least.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but didn't work on my leather furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, exactly as described and color was better than expected, wouldn't stay put on my leather furniture without tacking it and I didn't want to do that so I had to return. I wish it would have worked, they are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s very soft and has a comfy feeling.. my cat loves to curl up on the couch now. I had a little trouble figuring which way to line it up and I can’t seem to tuck it into the couch the way is like to but overall I’m satisfied with the cover and gave a whole new look to the room!
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have an IKEA Klippan loveseat, and this cover fit absolutely perfect. The cream is as seen in the description and is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kordosky

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Not great for oversized couches. Doesn't quite cover entirely. Good for lower level couches
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Guidi

customer_reviews.title: Great covers!
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great quality and soft. Be sure to look at the tag and put it on correctly- made that mistake a few times and got frustrated! I recommend purchasing upholstery pins or tuck grips to keep tucks in place otherwise they come out easily. Very happy with these covers! Saved my couches that were close to being thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fit, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the loveseat and chair slipcovers in Silver Cloud and I am thrilled with the fit and quality of this product. As you can see from the photos, the actual color is definitely more cream or a light beige so don't be fooled by the name of this color choice. It will be very versatile as I change out pillows and throws throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it’s surprisingly nice. Very soft and made our old couches look new
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to put on and it stays :-) I put a no-slip dog protector throw in first, since I have a leather couch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/Feels and looks great
customer_reviews.text: It fit my loveseat like a glove! It’s very soft and looks great. Just measure your couch and make sure it’s within the dimensions of the cover. Would buy again for other couches!
customer_reviews.author: Jay G

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. It has held up very nicely, I’d definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jjeffers89

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fit my wide loveseat very well and snug. Stretchable and soft material. Stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Latina Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Easy care
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised as how easily the hair from my 3 cats wipes right off the material. Got the sofa and loveseat covers and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: eshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: overall okay
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the quality but it does not stay fit. Keeps slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft material and feels very cozy. It added life to my old sofaWouldn’t stay in place . Had to add foam roller to tuck it in
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Jambhekar

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love of this cover
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality and very soft. Easy to put in and remove. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Agosto

customer_reviews.title: I would have really liked this cover but it just didn't fit my loveseat ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have really liked this cover but it just didn't fit my loveseat all of the way. The quality was great and the velvet was so soft but it didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.author: eamanzo89

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best cover for furniture! In house of 4 dogs I have bought more than a fair share of covers. These by far are the softest yet most durable I have ever seen. Also, they are stylish.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Petersen

product_meta.title: Great Bay Home Velvet Plush Stretch Loveseat Slipcover. Velvet Loveseat Furniture Protector, Soft Anti-Slip, High Stretch (Loveseat- 2 Seater, Dark Grey)
feature_bullets: Protect: This slipcover shields and Protects your furniture from spills, stains, wear and tear to prevent it from everyday mishaps. It’s great for homes with children and pets.
Fits Most Furniture: Our Stretch slipcovers are one-size-fits-most. Our Slipcovers fit most Love Seats up to 68 inches wide. Please Measure Before Purchasing.
Stays in Place: This slipcover is conveniently Strapless and Slip Resistant with an Elasticized Bottom.

Lightweight, Comfortable and Easy Care: Available in a variety of solid colors that will freshen up any home décor! Machine Washable: Durable, high-quality material designed for long lasting use and enjoyment.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed: Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us. We’re confident you’ll love our products, but if you’re not 100% satisfied, our customer service team will work with you to make it right!
